name: rest-api
description: ## Installations - [ ] express * npm install --save express * configuration   * var express = require('express') - [ ] passport * npm install --save passport * configuration   * var passport = require('passport') - [ ] local-passport * npm install --save local-passport * configuration   * var LocalStrategy = require('passport-local') - [ ] jsonwebtoken * npm install --save jsonwebtoken * configuration   * var jwt = require('jsonwebtoken') - [ ] sequelize * npm install --save sequelize * configuration   * var sequelize = require('sequelize')
